TopicTitle: Is there a way to hide the HUD?

Articles.Content: Well you clicked on the thread so hopefully you have something to say. So do ya? Punk?
At the moment, as far as I know, no.

Open the game windowed, at a higher resolution than your screen can fit. Move the window so that the bottom instruments are off the bottom of the screen, and then drag another window over the top instruments.

TA DA! HUD hidden. ;D
